title: Loyiso Bala celebrates 8 years with his wife: "Let’s go for another 65 years baby"
text:
Loyiso Bala celebrates 8 years with his wife: "Let’s go for another 65 years baby" share this

Local musician Loyiso Bala has never hidden how much he loves his wife. Every year on their anniversary they publicly show their affection by posting sweet messages to each other. And this year was no different.

Celebrating eight years together, Loyiso took to Instagram to show his wife just how much he loves her, especially after all the changes they’ve gone through together.

READ MORE: Loyiso Bala's sweet message to his wife and daughters

The Girl Without a Name singer posted a snap of him and his wife on their wedding day and captioned it: “8 years, 2920 days, 70 080 hours, 2 daughters and 3 homes are not nearly enough for the amount of life that I still want to live with you. Let’s go for another 65 years baby.”

READ MORE: Loyiso Bala shares a sweet message to his wife in celebration of their 7-year anniversary

Jennifer also posted a sweet message to her gospel singer hubby, thanking him for the years they’ve spent together.

“Thank you for always loving me for who I am. I’m so happy that we found each other and have not lost each other in the process. Let’s celebrate the joys of today, the hopes of tomorrow, the many wonderful memories together and anticipate what lies ahead of us. Here’s to many, many more with our blessing of a family. Love you mountains.”
